Skills

My stack

  • HTML5

    It creates the frame of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO optimized the structure of your product

  • CSS3

    This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

  • SCSS/SAAS

    This a pre-processor scripting language that will be compiled or interpreted into CSS.

  • BOOTSTRAP

    Bootstrap is CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains HTML, CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

  • Java Script

    This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.

  • Typescript

    It is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language.

  • Jquery

    The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present

  • Gulp

    The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present

  • React

    This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes

  • Redux

    This JavaScript library for managing and centralizing application state. It is most commonly used with libraries such as React or Angular for building user interfaces.

  • Node.js

    This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform the actions that the user does not see

  • Mongo.db

    It is a non-relational database that will store data your site or application
